SEARCH
Package services

Interface TransactionManager.TransactionListener

Enclosing class:
TransactionManager
public static interface TransactionManager.TransactionListener
Interface for transaction event listeners. Implementations of this interface will be notified of transaction changes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onTransactionAdded(String date, String description, String amount, String type)
    Called when a new transaction is added.
    void
    onTransactionRemoved(String date, String description, String amount, String type)
    Called when a transaction is removed.
    void
    onTransactionUpdated(String oldDate, String oldDescription, String oldAmount, String oldType, String newDate, String newDescription, String newAmount, String newType)
    Called when an existing transaction is updated.

  • Method Details

    • onTransactionAdded

      void onTransactionAdded(String date, String description, String amount, String type)
      Called when a new transaction is added.
      Parameters:
      date - the transaction date
      description - the transaction description
      amount - the transaction amount
      type - the transaction type

    • onTransactionUpdated

      void onTransactionUpdated(String oldDate, String oldDescription, String oldAmount, String oldType, String newDate, String newDescription, String newAmount, String newType)
      Called when an existing transaction is updated.
      Parameters:
      oldDate - the previous transaction date
      oldDescription - the previous transaction description
      oldAmount - the previous transaction amount
      oldType - the previous transaction type
      newDate - the new transaction date
      newDescription - the new transaction description
      newAmount - the new transaction amount
      newType - the new transaction type

    • onTransactionRemoved

      void onTransactionRemoved(String date, String description, String amount, String type)
      Called when a transaction is removed.
      Parameters:
      date - the removed transaction date
      description - the removed transaction description
      amount - the removed transaction amount
      type - the removed transaction type
